DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of belatacept on the pharmacokinetics of caffeine, losartan, omeprazole, dextromethorphan and midazolam
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Effect of Belatacept on Pharmacokinetics of Inje Cocktail in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: BMI 18 to 30 kg/m2 Men and women ages 18 to 45 Active tuberculosis Any recent infection requiring antibiotic treatment within 4 weeks of dosing Positive urine screen for drugs of abuse
